summary: 17-year-old Mariano finds a gun in his house and, in a thoughtless impulse, shoots himself twice. But he survives.
cast: Susana Pampín|Rafael Federman|Benjamín Coehlo|Camila Fabbri|Manuela Martelli|María Inés Sancerni|Walter Jakob|Laura Paredes|Eleonora Capobianco|Daniela Pal|Fabián Arenillas|Claudia Cantero|Mariel Fernández|Fernando Contigiani García|Hernan Glatsman|Edgardo Castro|Matías Panaro|Yamila Ulanovsky|Pablo Laborde|Agustín Mendilaharzu|Pablo Caramelo|Marcelo Mariño|Lucas Martín Saldaña|Rubén Estévez|Leo García|Marcelo Szechtman|Guido Jurajevcic|Gastón Jurajevcic
title: Dos disparos
